abstract: Milwaukee Brewers defeat Arizona Diamondbacks, 9-4, to lead National League division series, 2-0.
snippet: The Brewers took advantage of some mental mistakes by the Diamondbacks to break open a close game and take a 2-0 lead in their National League division series.
lead_paragraph: The Brewers took advantage of some mental mistakes by the Diamondbacks to break open a close game and take a 2-0 lead in their National League division series.

headline.main: Brewers Flex Their Muscles and Push Past the Diamondbacks Again
headline.print_headline: Brewers Flex Their Muscles and Push Past the Diamondbacks Again
headline.seo: Brewers Flex Their Muscles and Push Past the Diamondbacks Again
